Cleveland Cavaliers vs. Golden State Warriors: 6/1 Cleveland Cavaliers vs. Golden State Warriors: 8/1 Cleveland Cavaliers vs. OKC Thunder: 10/1 Photo: Jeff Haynes /AFP /Getty Images Image 16 of 16 Props bets for 2015-2016 NBA season laud Spurs 1 / 16 Back to Gallery The NBA regular season is just one day away, which means it's time for prop bets.
Sports Betting Dime released a list of odds and over/unders for the coming season, ranging from standard to funky to somewhat cruel (especially regarding the New York Knicks and Philadelphia 76ers).
How many games will Tim Duncan suit up for?
Will the Knicks' first win come against the Spurs on Nov. 2?
Will LaMarcus Aldridge be the best free agent signing of 2015? The worst?
Are the Spurs the West's odds-on favorite to reach the NBA Finals against the Cleveland Cavaliers?
Click through the slides above to see 15 of the most interesting prop bets for the coming season, courtesy of SportsBettingDime.com .
